Browser Extension Development Instructions

Project: Focus Shield - Firefox MV3 extension
Status: Complete and production-ready

Directory structure:
- src/ contains TypeScript source (background, popup, options, content, common, types)
- public/ contains HTML and CSS assets
- dist/ contains compiled output (generated by webpack)
- manifest.json at root with proper Gecko ID

Build process:
- npm install for dependencies
- npm run build for production compilation
- npm run dev for watch mode development

Loading in Firefox/Zen:
- Navigate to about:debugging
- Click "This Firefox" or "This Zen"
- Click "Load Temporary Add-on..."
- Select manifest.json from root

Technical details:
- Haversine formula for distance calculation
- browser.webRequest.onBeforeRequest for blocking
- browser.storage.local for data persistence
- No external APIs or external dependencies
